mapper.select: SELECT count(article_gnum) AS countGnum FROM article_gathering WHERE center_num = (SELECT center_num FROM centertbl WHERE center_name= #{centerName}) ORDER BY count(article_gnum) DESC
SELECT article_gnum FROM article_gathering WHERE center_num = (SELECT center_num FROM centertbl WHERE center_name= #{centerName})

SELECT G.article_gtitle, G.article_gnum, (SELECT COUNT(P.user_id) FROM post_gathering AS P WHERE P.article_gnum = G.article_gnum AND G.article_gnum = #{ articleGnum } ) AS countPuser FROM article_gathering AS G WHERE G.center_num = (SELECT C.center_num FROM centertbl AS C WHERE C.center_name= #{centerName}) GROUP BY G.article_gtitle, G.article_gnum

SELECT G.article_gnum, G.article_gtitle, G.article_gcontent, G.article_gdate, G.category_type, G.user_id, (SELECT COUNT(P.user_id) FROM post_gathering AS P WHERE P.article_gnum = G.article_gnum AND G.article_gnum = #{ articleGnum } ) AS countPuser, (SELECT P.user_id FROM post_gathering AS P WHERE P.article_gnum = G.article_gnum AND G.article_gnum = #{articleGnum} ) AS joinUser FROM article_gathering AS G WHERE G.article_gnum = #{articleGnum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article_gathering (article_gtitle, article_gcontent,user_id,category_type,center_num) SELECT #{articleGtitle},#{articleGcontent},#{userId},#{categoryType},center_num FROM centertbl WHERE center_name = #{centerName}
mapper.update: UPDATE article_gathering SET article_gtitle = #{articleGtitle}, article_gcontent = #{articleGcontent}, center_num = (SELECT center_num FROM centertbl WHERE center_name = #{centerName}) WHERE article_gnum = #{articleGnum}
mapper.select: SELECT article_gnum , article_gtitle, article_gdate, user_id FROM article_gathering WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY article_gnum DESC
